name: Cave²
description:
The characters we used in our game are not orignal and selfmade except for our main character called Shroom. Shroom is one of the last mushroom people alive in the world of our game. Shroom travels trough the world as an adventurer solving questions here and there. He really likes exploring the unknown areas of our world!

Controls:

W = Forward

A = Left

D = Right

S = Backwards

(the arrow keys can be used aswell)

ALT = interact
